channel.title: Ban hammer!
channel.description:
I made a ban hammer for my brother upon request lol here is the result: [URL=http://img15.imageshack.us/i/37814098.png/][IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/4756/37814098.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img840.imageshack.us/i/55483890.png/][IMG]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/4411/55483890.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Ban hammer!
item.dc:creator: @swebbyscape swebbyscape
item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

Well since everyone kinda shot your hammer down… Im gonna have to say…

Awesome.
This hammer is sexy and its awesome!

Good luck to whatever you do. I hope this post brought up your confidence a little

Read full topic

item.title: Ban hammer!
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

andr3wrulz:

i get that this is a shitty model but seriously if people didnt put up shitty models for people like most of you to troll at you would have nothing to do with your life. Im actually pretty decent at modeling and this was JUST A MOCK JOB ON PURPOSE

Disregard the faggots that are putting you down, they are just trying to make themselves look like better modelers when they themselves cant acknowledge their faults.

@faggots putting andrew down, im 100% sure you all started off pretty bad and you would have felt pretty low if people did nothing but flame your model and not even tell you what you could do to improve on it. If you get annoyed by seeing a bad model then dont come to this section anymore, people are going to post their work in order to have people critique it and get tips on improving their skills. Calling the model shit and being not worth criticism is a complete ignorant statement, it has room for improvement and thus should the errors on the model made apparent.

Read full topic

i get that this is a shitty model but seriously if people didnt put up shitty models for people like most of you to troll at you would have nothing to do with your life. Im actually pretty decent at modeling and this was JUST A MOCK JOB ON PURPOSE

item.title: Ban hammer!
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:25, topic:387462”][quote author=Rash link=topic=483266.msg3539993#msg3539993 date=1300796044]

Keep things this shit to yourself.

I’m sure your comment was needed? Please be quiet and stop or post something better if it annoys you so much.

I said nearly the exact same thing.

Because people don’t want to see a 2 minute job posted. Post a stupid model, get a stupid comment fair game?

That input was not needed, we didn’t say shit to you because of your first models we tried to help you. We could have left you in a ditch and you would still have no skills in modelling whatsoever. Now if you think you can ditch other new people, doesn’t that make you the asshole? Fair game?

Oi mate, i try to help new comers it’s not my fault they think we don’t help. I’m in to help anyone where ever they need help, but if they go around saying no older modellers are helping then it’s not our fault. If you do the time you might aswell do the crime huh? Also i got quite alot of shit for posting bad models, so i stopped posting all the ones that were horrible. On the other hand, if he needs help improving his models he can ask any modeller and id be glad to help. If you don’t ask for it, you won’t get it.

LOL at the god sword recolor part.

[/quote]
Wasn’t a recolour. I made that completely from scratch lol. :D[/quote]

I know.

He edited his post.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban hammer!
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:2, topic:387462”]Been done before.

Concept sucks. Model is horribly done as well.[/quote]

Well he may be new, this may not be the best model. But digging him into the ground? And breaking his spirit is just fucking wrong. Take a break from trolling for just a few days please! I think quite a few people would agree, everyone started out making models like this and only thing he did was post it and you think that it’s right to be a faggot to him just because of that? Gawd he might go casey on you.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban hammer!
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:13, topic:387462”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=483266.msg3539809#msg3539809 date=1300769766]

apparently nobody got that this was just a joke 98% of the time im serious and yet the other 2% im a complete idiot for making a joke. this section has gone downhill because the only people that can be “bothered” to contribute are the people that arent amazing at modeling it bugs me that people have such high expectations for people when there is no instruction and no one that helps out. Sorry but that’s just my take on the situation

I’m sorry to say but I do help people out and so do ALOT of other people, ask around. I make people models (eg. Korasi sword), I’m working on projects with 2 other people that need models. I also helped Austin understand primitives, which I really have to go over again with him. If you ask other people they’d give you a list aswell. Point is people here help others out a lot, you just don’t see it. Maybe if you opened your eyes a little and realised how many people have improved since joining this forum, then you’d understand.
[/quote]

You dont even understand what he is saying, he says you cant be bothered to tell him what he can do to fix his model, if you cant be bothered then dont be bothered to even post in this topic in the first place.

OT:I guess ill be the first to give you some real criticism.

The handle for the err… hammer is a big plane as just a basic cylinder, add some more prims to it to give it some design, Next you should elongate the sphere and make it more of a rectangular shape and put the tongue face on the face thats meant to hammer someone.[/quote]
This model isn’t worth saying whats wrong and right about it no offence. If you look on other models people do give CC and help people improve their models. If they choose not to realise what they are doing wrong and not fix it, its their fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Ban hammer!
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Try and make it a hammer, and the mouth could be better, and the handle could have more details instead of just the cylinder
